arccdn-opt-in: Opt into Arc CDN instead of having it rolled out to you by chance
arccdn-opt-in-help: Currently, [https://arc.io Arc CDN] is being rolled out to only a certain proportion of users. Checking this will enable it for you unconditionally, giving you a potential speedup and supporting the site.
arccdn-comment-rollout-percentage: $1 is less than or equal to $2
